entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'Harry'. He is trying to make an antidote but doesn't know what he's doing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who is also trying to make the antidote. He looks 'gormless' and unsure about what to do.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: A teacher whose desk Harry took a poison from. The poison is described as being a garish shade of pink.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who had previously recited Golpalott's Third Law to them. She is not present in this scene but mentioned as a source of knowledge.

entities.name: golpalott
entities.description: A person whose third law is mentioned in the story. The law is stated word for word by Hermione, but there are no notes on it in Harry's book.

entities.name: the prince
entities.description: Someone who is not present in this scene but mentioned as a potential source of help. He has written some notes in Harry's book, but they are not helpful for the task at hand.

relationships.description: Harry took a poison from Slughorn's desk, which he is now trying to use to make an antidote.
Hermione had previously recited Golpalott's Third Law to Harry, which he is now trying to understand.
Ron copied everything Harry did when making the antidote, but looks unsure about what to do next.
